name: antiX 23
install_guide_markdown:
# antiX 23 Installation Guide

antiX is a fast, lightweight Debian-based distro without systemd, ideal for older hardware.

install_steps.title: Download ISO
install_steps.detail_md: Grab the antiX 23 ISO from official mirrors.

install_steps.title: Create USB
install_steps.detail_md: Write ISO to USB with Etcher or dd.

install_steps.title: Boot Live
install_steps.detail_md: Boot from USB and select live environment.

install_steps.title: Run Installer
install_steps.detail_md: Use the GUI installer to set locale, partitions, and users.

commands.command: sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y

privacy_notes: antiX is community-driven with no telemetry.
notes: antiX uses IceWM/Fluxbox by default and supports runit/sysV init.
